member.name: T:OrchardCore.XmlRpc.Services.IXmlRpcReader
member.summary: Abstraction to read XML and convert it to rpc entities.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.XmlRpc.Services.IXmlRpcReader.MapToMethodCall(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Maps an XML element to a rpc method call.
member.param: The XML element to be mapped.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.XmlRpc.Services.IXmlRpcReader.MapToData(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Maps an XML element to rpc data.
member.param: The XML element to be mapped.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.XmlRpc.Services.IXmlRpcReader.MapToStruct(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Maps an XML element to a rpc struct.
member.param: The XML element to be mapped.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.XmlRpc.Services.IXmlRpcReader.MapToArray(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Maps an XML element to a rpc array.
member.param: The XML element to be mapped.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.XmlRpc.Services.IXmlRpcWriter
member.summary: Abstraction to write XML based on rpc entities.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.XmlRpc.Services.IXmlRpcWriter.MapMethodResponse(OrchardCore.XmlRpc.Models.XRpcMethodResponse)
member.summary: Maps a method response to XML.
member.param: The method response to be mapped.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.XmlRpc.Services.IXmlRpcWriter.MapStruct(OrchardCore.XmlRpc.Models.XRpcStruct)
member.summary: Maps a rpc struct to XML.
